description: The changes will establish no-fault divorce, eliminate contesting divorce and simplify annulment.
title: Guernsey agrees to make divorce law 'reflective of modern society'
title_page: Guernsey agrees to make divorce law 'reflective of modern society' - BBC News
maintext: The process to enact the changes came after a 2015 resolution which called for recognition "that there was a need for the law to be reformed to ensure that it was both inclusive and reflective of modern society."
